p: T cell responses against Zaire Ebola GP were assessed using ex vivo (18-h stimulation) IFN-Î³ ELISPOT assays as previously described ( Venkatraman et al., 2018). Assays were conducted using fresh PBMCs, therefore performed in Oxford for the UK cohort and in Dakar for the Senegalese cohort. The same protocol was used for both cohorts, and a thorough process of technology transfer and training was conducted before study commencement to minimize assay variation between the trial sites.
